articles.description: Since the ruling, the power companies and government and state officials have scrambled to find a solution for both businesses and birds. They have discussed the technical difficulties of taking high-voltage lines below ground, the cost implications and even …
articles.content:
Pity the great Indian bustard.
The majestic, endangered bird is massive, making it slow to maneuver in flight. It has poor frontal vision, and an unfortunate habit of scanning the earth while flying… [+5416 chars]
